src_text: Go Tsenngwa Tirisong ga Manaane a Puso a a Botlhokwa Kabinete e amogetse go saeniwa ga ditumelano di le 26 tsa boleng jo bo kanaka R94 bilione go tswa mo Ketelong ya Puso ya Moporesitente wa China Xi Jinping ya mo maloben Ditumelano tse di saenilweng di akaretsa R12 bilione ya go aga bodutelo jwa dikoloi mo Aforika Borwa, ya madikadimo a a kanaka US$500 milione go tsamaisa ditlhabololo tsa mafaratlhatlha a Eskom le ya tlamelo e e netefaleditsweng e e kanaka US$bilione go thusa Transnet go tswa kwa Bankeng ya Ditlhabololo ya ChinJaaka Foramo ya Bobedi ya Tirisanommogo ya China-Aforika (FOCAC),Moporesitente Jinping o ikanne go beeletsa US$60 bilione tebang le tlhabololo mo AforikKamogelotiragatso ya Tlhomamiso e nt hwa mmogo le Leanotiro la (2016-2018) kwa FOCAC le sobokanya kgolo ya tirisanommogo magareng ga Aforika le China, e leng se se tla bulelang dit hono tse dit hwa tsa kgwebisano le dipeeletso go thusa go tlhatlosa kgolo ya ikonomIkonomi e amogetse gape le tshegetso ya ikonomi go tswa kwa Setlhopheng sa BMW sa Aforika Borwa ka go tlhagisa dipeeletso tsa bokanaka R6 bilione kwa bodutelong jwa yone jwa Rosslyn, Pretoria, e leng se se pakang tirisano mmogo e e botlhokwa e e leng teng magareng ga kgwebo le puso, mmogo le tiro eo kgwebo e e jarileng mo go tlhabololeng ikonom Ka labobedi, 8 Sedimonthole, Moporesitente Zuma o apesitse baagi ba Aforika Borwa mmogo le batswantle ba ba tlotlegang bao ba nnileng le seabe mo go rotloetseng ditirelo tsa botho Matshwao a Tlotlo a Boset hab Matshwao a Tlotlo a Boset haba ke motsotswana wa go lebelela kwa morago, go keteka le go ikgantsha ka batho ba boron A keteka diphitlhelelo tsa botho, go ikentsha setlhabelo ga batho le kgaratlho ya batho eo e dirang gore naga ya rona e nne lefelo le le botok Re bontsha tlotlo go baamogedi ba Matshwao a Tlotlo a Boset haba ba 2013.
trg_text: Implementation of key government programmes Cabinet welcomed the signing of 26 agreements to the value of R94 billion during the recent State Visit by Chinese President Xi Jinpin The signed agreements included R12 billion to build a car-manufacturing plant in South Africa, a US$500 million loan facility to Eskom for infrastructure development and a US$billion funding guarantee for Transnet from the China Development Ban

src_text: Kabinete e ikuela mo go maAforika Borwa otlhe go somarela mets Seno ke go tshegetsa dikgato di le dintsinyana tse di tserweng go ka fokotsa tlhaelo ya metsi, e leng seo se gagamaditsweng ke mogote oo naga e itemogetseng one mo dibekeng tse di fetilen Le fa e le gore pula ya mo malobeng kwa dikarolong tse dingwe tsa naga e fokoditse kimologo, tlhaelo ya metsi ya naga e tswelela go nna kgwetlho e kgolo mme go tlhokega gore rona rotlhe re somarele metsi le go a dirisa ka maikarabel Kabinete e tlhagisitse ditebogo tsa yone mo maAforika Borweng otlhe ka go tsaya karolo mo Letsholong la monongwaga la Matsatsi a le 16 a Bolweladitshwanelo Kgatlhanong le Tiririsodikgoka mo Basading le mo Baneng, le le konoseditsweng ka la bo 10 Sedimonthole 2015.
trg_text: Cabinet appeals to all South Africans to use water sparingl This is in support of a number of measures taken to alleviate the water shortages, which have been exacerbated by the heatwave the country has experienced in the past week Whilst the recent rainfalls in some parts of the country provided some relief, the country s water shortage remains a real challenge and requires all of us to use water sparingly and responsibl

src_text: Dipatlisiso tsa se weng di bontsha gore palo e e kwa godimo ya ditshwaetso tse dint hwa, bogolosegolo mo makgarebeng le mo basetsanyaneng mo Aforika, e mo bao ba leng magareng ga dingwaga di le 15 le 24.MaAforika Borwa a rotloediwa go gatelapele ka ditiro tsa manaane a bolweladitshwanelo a letsatsi le letsatsi jaaka karolo ya go nna Kgatlhanong le Tirisodikgoka mo Basading le mo Baneng ya #365 Days Campaign le ya letsholo la #CountMeIn e leng tse di diragadiwang ngwaga otlhKa go dirisa #365 Days Campaign le #CountMeIn, naga e tlhoka go tswelela go golaganya ditokololo tsa baagi, bogolosegolo banna, go golagana le puso mo go samaganeng le leuba lenKe maikarabelo a naga, ka bongwe jwa rona kgotsa ka go golagana ga rona, go fedisa go ata ga kokwanatlhoko ka go tlhokomela boitekanelo jwa rona le jwa batho ba bangw Kabinete e itumedisitswe ke kgatelopele e e dirilweng ke Lekgotla la Dipatlisiso tsa Saense le Intaseteri ka go tlhagisa thulaganyo ya tlhagiso ya melemo ya HISeno se atumetsa intaseteri ya boitekanelo gaufi le kalafi ya thibelobolwetse e e sa jeng madi a mants Fa naga e ssantse e tsweletse go kgarakgadiwa ke go batlana le kalafi ya go fedisa HIV le AIDS, maAforika Borwa a tswelela go rotloediwa go tsenela thobalano e e babalesegileng le go obamela metheo ya ABC (Ikilele mo thobalanong, Ikanyege mme o Dirise Mosomelwana).Kabinete e akgotse barutwana botlhe, baithuti, barutabana, bafatlhosi, dikolo le ditheo tsa thuto e kgolwane ka go konosetsa ngwaga wa dithuto o o atlegileng, le fa go nnile le dikgwetlho tse go itemogetsweng tsone mo gare ga ngwag Kabinete gape e lakaletsa masego bao ba dumetseng go sutisa letlha la ditlhatlhobo go tshwarwa ka 2017.
trg_text: Cabinet expressed its appreciation to all South Africans for participating in this year s 16 Days of Activism for No Violence against Women and Children campaign, which ended yesterda Recent research indicates high numbers of new HIV infections, particularly among young women and girls in Africa between 15 and 24 years of ag South Africans are encouraged to take forward their activism into everyday action as part of the #365 Days Campaign of No Violence Against Women and Children and the #CountMeIn campaign that unfolds throughout the year aheaThrough the #365 Days Campaign and #CountMeIn, the country needs to continue mobilising members of society, especially men, to join hands with government in dealing with this scourg It is the responsibility of the nation, both individually and collectively, to stop the spread of the virus by taking care of our own health and that of other

src_text: Lefapha la Tlhabololo ya Loago, ka tirisanommogo le Lefapha la Phemelo mmogo le Setheo sa Naga sa Tlhabololo ya Ba wa, ba tla tshwara Kopano ya bone ya Ba wa ya Boset haba ya bo 6.
trg_text: The Department of Social Development, in collaboration with Department of Defense and National Youth Development Agency, will hold its 6th National Youth Cam This is a youth leadership development programme that seeks to change behaviour, attitudes and empower the youth about opportunities at their disposa

src_text: Leno ke lenaale la tlhabololo ya boeteledipele leo maitlhomo a lone e leng go fetola maitshwaro le go natlafatsa ba wa ka dit hono tse di leng fa pele ga matlho a bon Kopano eno gape e thusa ka go ruta basimanyana go ka nna banna ba ba tlotlang basad Tumelano e e kopanetsweng e e saenilweng ke Tona ya Lefapha la Thuto le Katiso tse di Kgolwan, Ngaka Blade Nzimande, mmogo le balekane ba BRICS e leng
trg_text: Cabinet has appreciated the progress that has been made by the Council for Scientific and Industrial Research in developing a bio-manufacturing process for HIV antibodie This brings the health industry a step closer to an economically viable preventative treatmen Whilst the country still struggles to find the cure for HIV and AIDS, South Africans are still expected to practice safe sex and observe the ABC (Abstain, Be faithful and Condomise) principles of preventing new infection

src_text: Brazil, Russia, India le China
trg_text: Brazil, Russia, India and China

src_text: e ikemiseditse go ka tlhagisa letlhomeso la tirisanommogo mo thutong mo nakong e e tlanTumelano e akaretsa thutokakaretso, togamaano ya dipholisis tsa thuto, dikholeje le dithuto tse dikgolwane tsa Katiso le Thuto ya Diatla le ya Setegenik (TVET) Dikholeje tsa TVET di na le bokgoni jwa go bulela dit hono tsa ikonomi mo ba weng ba borona, fa ka fa letlhakoreng le lengwe di baakanya dikgwetlho tsa botlhokatiro, tlhokotekatekano le lehumTumelano, e e tla tokafatsang boleng jwa go ithuta le jwa thuto ya barutabana, gape e dira gore diyunibesiti tsa BRICS di ipofe go tshegetsa diporojeke tsa dipatlisiso tse di kopanetsweng, go rotloetsa manaane a tirisanommogo mo maemong a thuto ya morago ga go konosetsa dithuto tsa ntlha tse digolwane, a bongaka le a a kwa godimo ga a bongaka mmogo le go phasaladiwa sebedi ga dipoelo tsa saens Lefapha la Saense le Thekenoloji le ne le tshwere Foramo ya Saense ya Aforika Borwa ka fa tlase ga moono
trg_text: is aimed at developing a framework for future cooperation in educatio The agreement covers general education, educational policy strategy, Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET) colleges and higher educatio TVET colleges hold the potential to unlock economic opportunities for our young people, while addressing the challenges of unemployment, inequality and poverty affecting communitie

src_text: Re tlhotlheletsa dipuisano ka ga saense .
trg_text: Igniting conversations about science .

src_text: Palo e e fetang dikete di le 45 e tsenetse dikganetsano ka ga kipano le saense, thekenoloji le boitlhamedi mmogo le baagi, bogolosegolo go totilwe tlhabolol Gape foramo e nnile le karolo ya go matlafatsa ditirisanommogo tsa boitlhamedi tsa thekenoloji, saense ya bodit habat haba tsa togamaano ya Aforika Borw.
trg_text: Over 45 countries participated in debates on the interface between science, technology and innovation and society, specifically in the context of developmen The forum also served to strengthen South Africa s strategic international science, technology and innovation partnership .

src_text: Aforika Borwa e tla emelwa mo Lekgotleng la Mokgatlho wa Bodit habat haba wa tsa kwa Lewatlen Eno ke kgato e kgolo go ka fitlhelela bokgoni jwa naga le jwa kontinente mo lekaleng la tsa kwa LewatlenMokgatlho o rwele maikarabelo a go tsenyatirisong ditshwetso mo mererong ya tsa kwa lewatleng ya lefatshe, go simolola ka Ikonomi ya kwa Mawatleng, dikgato tsa thuso mmogo le dintlha tsa pabalesego le tshireletsego kwa lewatlenGo tseeng karolo mo mokgatlhong ono go tla tshegetsa lenaane la puso la go bulela bokgoni jwa mawatleng jwa naga ka go dirisa Buka ya Togamaano ya Ikonomi ya kwa Mawatleng mmogo le Operation Phakisa, e eleng tseo di ikaeletseng go ka tlhola ditiro tse di ka fetang milione wa ditiro ka 2033. .
trg_text: South Africa will be represented in the Council of International Maritime Organisatio This is a major step towards realising the country and the continent s potential in the maritime secto The organisation is responsible for adopting decisions on global maritime affairs, ranging from the Oceans Economy, rescue initiatives and safety and security matters at se The participation in this body will support government s programme of unlocking the country s maritime potential through the Blue Oceans Economy Strategy and Operation Phakisa, which aims to create over one million jobs by 2033.

src_text: Sesole sa Tshireletso ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa (SANDF) se simolotse mo bekeng e e fetileng thulaganyo ya tlhabolola Setei ene sa Sesole sa kwa Metsing sa Setlhake sa Salisbury kwa Durban go ka nna kampa e e dirang ka botlalo ya sesole sa kwa metsin Nt hwafatso ya mafelotiriso e tla tokafatsa bokgoni jwa tsa tshireletsego mmogo le go nna le seabe mo ikonoming ya kwa mawatlen.
trg_text: The South African National Defence Force commenced in the past week a process to upgrade Salisbury Island Naval Station in Durban into a fully functional naval bas The upgrading of facilities will improve defence capabilities and also contribute towards the ocean econom .

src_text: Lefapha la Boitekanelo ka tirisanommogo le Soul City le Times Media, le thankgolotse kanale ya thelebi ene e e samaganang le tsa boitekanelo tsa mokgwa wa go itlhokomela ya The Good Life Network mo kanaleng ya 199 ya DSt Kanale e abelana ka diteng tsa fa gae tsa mmatota tse di dirang gore o itise tse di farologaneng ka ga dijo, go ikatisa, ditshwanelo tsa botho, dirwe tsa thobalano mo ba weng, HIV le TB, mmogo le ditshwanelo tsa bareki le tsa bong jo bo farologanen Kabinete e ikuela mo maAforika Borweng go bogela kanale eno2.
trg_text: The channel offers diverse, entertaining and original home-grown content on nutrition, health and fitness, human rights, youth sexuality, HIV and TB, as well as consumer and gender right Cabinet calls on South Africans to watch the channe 2.

src_text: Ditshwetso tse di botlhokwa tsa Kabinete Kabinete e letleletse gore go phasaladiwe Lokwalotemoso lwa lefapha la puso ka ga In orense ya Boset haba ya Boitekanelo, In orense ya Boset haba ya Boitekanelo (NHI) mo Aforika Borwa gore baagi ba dire ditshwael NHI ke karolo e kgolo ya puso ya nt hwafatso ya lekala la boitekanelPholisi e tshitshinya bokgoni jwa puso jwa go abelana ka ditirelo tsa boitekanelo mo go botlhe bao ba etelang mafelotiriso a bone a boitekanel E tla tlamelwa ka matlole ka go dirisa motlamedi wa matlole otlhe ao a tla dirisediwang gape le go duelela badiredi ba ditlamo tsa boitekanelo tsa poraefete bao ba batlang go nna le karolo mo sekemeng sen Fa e fetswa go konosediwa, pholisi eo e tla tsenngwatirisong mo pakeng ya dingwaga di le tharo mme e tla tsepamisa mogopolo bogolosegolo mo go simololeng go thusa mafelo a a sa boneng ditirelo tse di lekanenTona ya Boitekanelo, Ngaka Aaron Motsoaledi, gompieno o tla ema ka lefoko bobegakgang mabapi le go tsenngwatirisong ga NH Kabinete e atlenegisitse Pholisi e e Kopanetsweng ya Boset haba ya Thuto ya Bana ya go sa le Gale (ECD).Pholisi e tlhagisitswe ka go buisana le bannaleseabe ba ba farologaneng mo lekaleng len E ne ya isiwa kwa baaging gore ba dire ditshwaelo ka Tlhakole 2015.Pholisi eno e e kopanetsweng ya ECD e tla netefatsa gore bana botlhe le batlhokomedi ba bone ba kgona go fitlhelela ditirelo tse di boleng tse di mosola tsa ECD go tswa kwa tshimologong go fitlha kwa Mophatong wa
trg_text: Key Cabinet decisions Cabinet approved the publication of the White Paper on the National Health Insurance (NHI) for South Africa, for public commen The NHI is part of government s major health sector reform The policy proposes government s ability to offer medical services to all who visit its health facilitie It will be funded through a central fund that will also be made available to private medical practitioners who want to participate in the schem Once finalised, the policy will be phased in over the years and focus mainly on commencing in underserviced area The Minister of Health, Dr Aaron Motsoaledi, will today brief the media on the roll-out of the NH

src_text: Pholisi eno e atolosa ditirelo go fitlha mo baneng ba dingwaga di le robedi ba ba nang le dikgwetlho tsa go ithut Gape pholisi e abelana le ka letlhomeso la tekolo le tshekatsheko go netefatsa fa e tsenngwatirisong ka tshwanelo mo baneng botlhe go sa kgathalesege lotso lwa bone, bong jwa bone kgotsa tumelo ya bon Kabinete e amogetse Lokwalotemoso lwa lefapha la puso tebang le Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba nang le Bogole mmogo le Dikgatosenngotirisong tsa lon Seno se bapisitswe le Dipeelo tsa Tlhabololo ya Tshomarelo ya go akaretsa bagolofadi, tseo di amogetsweng ke Kopanokakaretso ya Dinagakopano (UNGA) ka Lwetse 2015.Pholisi e tla gatelela phetolothefosano le dipaakanyo mabapi le kakaretso yotlhe, go kopanngwa le tekatekano tebang le batho ba ba nang le bogol
trg_text: Cabinet approved the report on progress regarding the implementation of the Cabinet directives in Limpopo in terms of Section 100 (1) (a) of the Constitutio Cabinet approved the withdrawal of Section 100 (1) (a) by 31 March 2016 in the following Limpopo provincial departments: Health; Transport; Public Works; Roads and Infrastructure and TreasurCabinet also approved the conditional withdrawal of Section 100 (1) (a) in Education to pave the way for the Provincial Treasury to effectively implement Section 18 of the Public Finance Management Act, 1999 (Act 1 of 1999) in the Limpopo Department of Education, with support from national governmenCabinet approved the following directives to the Premier and the MECs for Finance and of Education:a) Capacitating the provincial departments by recruiting competent personnel;b) Finalising the appointment of senior management positions; andc) Dealing decisively with leadership failure and corruptio .

src_text: Kabinete e amogetse go phasaladiwa ga Pholisi ya Kgeleloleswe ya Boset haba gore baagi ba dire ditshwael Pholisi e beela boitekanelo jwa batho kwa setlhoeng mo tlhabololong ka go dira gore go nne le tekatekano tebang le go abelana ka metswedi ya matlole go ka tshegetsa dipeeletso mo maemong a a kwa godimo a ditirelo, go abela ditirelo kwa malapeng a a tlamelwang ka ditirelo tse dinnye, ntse go tsweletswe go tlhokomela le go nt hwafatsa mafaratlhatlha a a santseng a le teng a kgelelolesw Kabinete e amogetse go tlisiwa kwa Palamenteng ya Aforika Borwa ga Pegelo ya Dipaka di le Tlhano (2009-2014) ka ga Go Tsenngwa Tirisong ga Melao ya go Fedisa Mekgwa yotlhe ya Tlhaolele mo Basadin Pegelo e tlamela ka lemorago la mesola ya melao e e farologaneng, dipholisis le manaane ao a tsentsweng tirisong mmogo le go neela dintlhakgolo tsa dikatlego tsa naga fa go tla mo matlafatsong ya basadi le tekatekano ya bon Pegelo gape e tlhagisa gore go na le dikgwetlho tse di tsweletseng le dikgoreletso go ka fedisa tlhokotekatekano le tlhaolele mo nagen Kabinete e amogetse go phasaladiwa ga Leanotirotlhomo la Boset haba la Twantsho ya Ditiro tsa Tlhaolele, Tlhaolele go ya ka Lotso, Tlhaolele go ya ka Semorafe mmogo le Ditiragalo tse Dingwe tsa Tlhoko Itshokelano, gore baagi ba dire ditshwaelLeano leno ke togamaano ya boset haba e e rulagantsweng e bile e kopanetswe ka maitlhomo a go lwantshana le tlhaolele go ya ka lotso mme go agiwa Aforika Borwa wa boammaruri wa temokerasi yo a senang tlhaolele go ya ka lotso le go ya ka bonLe neelana ka letlhomeso la dikgato tse di rulaganeng tsa leruri tse di ka tsewang ke naga ka bojotlhe go ka samagana le lefa la ditiro tsa tlhaolele le la tlhaolele go ya ka lotsSeno se thusa Aforika Borwa go ka fitlhelela maikano a yone a bodit habat haba, a kgaolo le a boset haba, bogolosegolo Kgoeletso ya Durban le Leanotiro tse di amogetsweng ke Dinagakopano (UN) kwa Khonferenseng ya Lefatshe e e kgatlhanong le Ditiro tsa Tlhaolele ka 2007.
trg_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the Draft National Action Plan to Combat Racism, Racial Discrimination, Xenophobia and Related Intolerance, for public commen The plan is an integrated and systematic national strategy aimed at combating racism and building a truly non-racist and non-sexist democratic South AfricIt provides a framework for sustained and coordinated measures to be undertaken by the country as a whole to deal with the legacy of racism and racial discriminatio This assists South Africa to meet its international, regional and national obligations, specifically the Durban Declaration and Programme of Action adopted by the UN at the World Conference against Racism in 2001.

src_text: Kabinete e nopoletswe ka kgatelopele e e dirilweng mo lenaaneng la phetolelokgaso go ya go ya dijithal E amogetse gape le tshimololo ya paka ya kgasopedi mabapi le kgaso ya dijithale mo Aforika Borwa go ka simolola ka la bo 1 Tlhakole 2016.Phetogelo e no ya go tswa mo ditirelong tsa kgaso ya analoko go ya go ya dijithale e tlhagisa makhubu a a tlhokegang thata a kgaso a a nang le matshwanedi a go abelana ka ditirelo tse di latelelang tsa porotebent Seno se tla oketsa kgaisano ya ikonomi ya Aforika Borwa ka go tsosolosa intaseteri ya kgaso, go natlafatsa intaseteri ya botlhagisi jwa ditlhagisiwa tsa ileketeroniki, go tlhola ditiro, mmogo le go tlhagisa mananeo a kgaso a a farologaneng a mantsi a fa ga Kabinete e nopoletswe ka ga diphitlhelelo tsa Pegelo ya Ditshupetso tsa Boitshimololedi le tsa Saense le Thekenoloji mo Aforika Borwa ya 2014 mmogo le setlwaedi sa tiragatso ya Thulaganyo ya Boitshimololedi ya Naga (NSI), tse di tlhagisiwang ngwaga le ngwaga ke Lekgotla la Dikeletso ka Boitshimololedi la Boset habPegelo e dirisa ditshupetso tse di diphatsa go ka sekaseka tiragatso le seabe sa NSI mo ditlapeleng tse di botlhokwa tsa boset haba tse di tlhagisitsweng ke Leano la Tlhabololo la Boset haba (NDP) mmogo le ditokomane tse dingwe tsa dipholisi tse di nang le seabe mo tlhabololong ya ikonomi ya loag Kabinete e amogetse go phosololwa ga dikgotlatshekelo tsa magiseterata tebang le Limpopo le Mpumalanga, mmogo le go tlhomiwa ga Kgotlatshekelo ya Magiseterata ya Lephalale jaaka kantoro ya tikologo ya Karolo ya Limpopo, go nna monamaotshwere go fitlhelela kantoro ya tikologo ya karolo ya leruri e agiwa mo lefelong leGo phosololwa ga dikgotlatshekelo tsa magiseterata mmogo le mafelo a taolo a Dikarolo tsa Kgotlatshekelo e Kgolo ka karolo ya nt hwafatso ya pholisi maitlhomo a yone ke go baakanya lefa la thulaganyo ya bodulo e e sa siamang ya mo maloben Ke karolo gape ya phetolothefosano e e namileng go ka thusa go ka fitlhelela bosiamisi, e leng seo se lepalepisitsweng le Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ya 19910.
trg_text: As part of the 2nd Forum on China-Africa Cooperation (FOCAC), President Xi Jinping pledged US$60 billion for development in Afric The adoption of a new Declaration and Plan of Action (2016-2018) at FOCAC consolidates the growing mutual partnership between Africa and China, which will unlock new trade and investment opportunities to help stimulate economic growtThe economy further received an economic boost with South Africa s BMW Group announcing an investment of R6 billion at its plant in Rosslyn, Pretoria, which bears testament to the important partnership that exists between business and government, and the role that business is playing in the development of the econom

src_text: Kabinete e amogetse pegelo ka ga kgatelopele mabapi le go tsenngwatirisong ga ditaelo tsa Kabinete kwa Limpopo go ya ka Karolo ya bo 100 (1) (a) ya MolaotheKabinete e amogetse go gogelwa morago ga ga Karolo ya bo 100 (1) (a) go fitlha ka Mopitlwe 2016 mo mafapheng a a latelang a porofense ya Limpopo: Lefapha la Boitekanelo; Lefapha la Dipalangwa; Lefapha la Ditirelo tsa Puso; Lefapha la Ditsela le Mafaratlhatlha go akaretsa le Lefapha la MatlolKabinete gape e amogetse go gogelwa morago ga nakwana ga Karolo ya bo 100 (1) (a) mo Thuto go ka ala tsela gore Lefapha la Matlole la Porofense le tsenya ka matlhagatlhaga Karolo ya bo 18 ya Molao wa Botsamaisi jwa Madi a Puso (PFMA), 1999 (Molao wa bo 1 wa 1999) kwa Lefapheng la Thuto la Limpopo, ka tshegetso go tswa kwa pusong ya boset habKabinete e amogetse ditaelo tse di latelang tebang le Tonakgolo le Bakhuduthamaga (di-MEC) tsa Matlole le tsa Thuto:a) Go tlamela ka badiredi mafapha a porofense ka go thapa badiredi ba ba gaisang;b) Go konosetsa go thapa botsamaisi jo bogolo; lec) Go samagana ka tshwanelo le go retelelwa le bogwenegwene jwa boeteledipel.
trg_text: Cabinet approved the rationalisation of magisterial districts for Limpopo and Mpumalanga, and the designation of the Lephalale Magistrate s Court as a local seat of the Limpopo Division of the High Court, as an interim measure until a separate permanent local seat of the Division is built in the areThe rationalisation of magisterial districts and areas of jurisdiction of the Divisions of the High Court is part of the policy reform aimed at redressing the legacy of spatial injustices of the pas It is also part of the broader transformation imperative to enhance access to justice, which is aligned to the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996. .

src_text: Kabinete e amogetse gore Aforika Borwa e tshware Khonferense ya maemo a a kwa godimo ya Dipuisano tse di leng Kgatlhanong le Diritibatsi go simolola ka la bo 11 go fitlha ka la bo 12 Mopitlwe 2016, e leng seo se tla nnang ka fa tlase ga taolo ya Mokgatlhotshwaraganelo wa Aforika (AU).Seno se diragadiwa jaaka kopano ya go lekola ya Dipuisano tse di Kgatlhanong le Diritibatsi magareng ga Aforika le Russia, e leng seo se ikaeletseng go tlhagisa maemo a a kopanetsweng tebang le go samagana le mathata a lefatsha a a ka ga diritibats Seno se tla tlhagisiwa kwa Kopanong e e Itlhophileng ya UNGA ka Moranang 2016.Ntwa kgatlhanong le diritibatsi tseo di seng mo molaong e tsamaisana le NDP e bile Dipuisano eno e tla tlhagisa serala sa go ka tsweletsa go gagamatsa Leano la Botlhokwa la Diritibatsi la Boset haba (2013-2017).. Kabinete e amogetse gore Lefapha la Bonno jwa Batho le tshware mmogo Khonferense le Lenaane la Bonno jwa Batho la
trg_text: Cabinet approved for South Africa to host the high level Anti-Drugs Dialogue Conference from 11 to 12 March 2016, which will be under the auspices of the African Unio This serves as a follow-up session of the Russia-Africa Anti-Drugs Dialogue, which aims to present a consolidated position regarding countering the world drug proble This will be tabled at the UNGA Special Session in April 2016.

trg_text: Cabinet has approved the White Paper on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities and its Implementation Matri This is aligned to the disability-inclusive Sustainable Development Goals, adopted by the United Nations (UN) General Assembly (UNGA) in September 2015.

src_text: Kabinete e amogetse gore Lekgotla la Dipatlisiso tsa Temothuo le tshware Khonferense ya Boraro e e ka ga Dipatlisiso tsa Temothuo tebang le Tlhabololo ka Moranang 2016.
trg_text: Cabinet was briefed on progress made on the digital migration programm It approved the commencement of the dual-illumination period for the digital broadcasting signal in South Africa on 1 February 2016.

src_text: Khonferense e tla nopola: dipatlisiso tsa bodit habat haba le ditlapele tsa boitshimololedi mmogo le ditlhokego mo thulaganyong ya boitshimololedi mo nageng gore go kgonagale go ka fitlhelela dipeelo tse di tlang tsa tlhabololo, bogolosegolo mo malapeng a balemirui mmogo le baagi ba ba humanegileng Melaotlhomo Kabinete e amogetse gore go phasaladiwe Molaotlhomo wa Tiromaano ya Sekgoba sa kwa Mawatleng wa 2015 gore baagi ba dire ditshwael Molaotlhomo yoo o abelana ka letlhomeso la semola go ka bulela bokgoni jwa ikonomi ya kwa mawatleng ka go rotloetsa tiromaano ya sekgoba sa dikoporas Molaotlhomo o tla thusa ditheo tseo di leng gone ga jaanong tsa Operation Phakis o batla go rotloetsa tirisanommogo le dithulaganyo tse di nang le maikarabelo tsa bobusi jwa mawatle Ditiragalo tse di tlang Moporesitente Zuma o tla etelela pele mokete wa naga wa Letsatsi la Poelano ka la bo 16 Sedimonthole kwa Port Elizabeth, Kapa Botlhaba ka fa tlase ga moono: "Go fokotsa dikgaogano: Go aga Legae la Set haba sa Aforika Borwa se se lebisang kwa pusong e tlhabololang set hab
trg_text: Cabinet was briefed on the findings of the 2014 South African Science, Technology and Innovation Indicators Report and the trends in the performance of the National System of Innovation (NSI), produced annually by the National Advisory Council on Innovatio The report uses critical indicators to assess the performance and contribution of the NSI to key national priorities articulated in the National Development Plan (NDP) and other policy documents which contribute to socio-economic developmen

src_text: Tona ya Lefapha la Mafaratlhatlha a Ditlhaeletsano le Ditirelo tsa Poso, Ngaka Siyabonga Cwele, o tla etelelapele baemedi ba Aforika Borwa kwa UNGA kwa Samiting ya Lefatshe ya Setlhopha sa Tshedimosetso go tloga ka la bo 15 go fitlha ka la bo 16 Sedimonthole 2015, mo maemo a naga ya Aforika Borwa, a tla nnang le seabe mo go WSIS+10 mo go ka se tlhagisiweng Pampiri-Epe Maemo a Kabinete mo Mererong e e Botlhokwa ya ga jaana Aforika Borwa e tshwere ka aktlego Samiti ya bo supa ya Diteropokgolo tsa Aforika le dipusoselegae tsa Aforika kwa Johannesburg go tloga ka la bo 29 Ngwanaitseele go fitlha ka la bo 3 Sedimonthole 2015.

src_text: Aforika yo re mo batlanSamiti eno e tshegetsa dipeelo tsa NDP mo diteropokgolo le dipusoselegae di tshamekang karolo e e botlhokwa mo tlhabololong ka botlal Kabinete e tswelela go itshepa gore fa dipuisano di tswelela kwa Khoferenseng ya Makoko ya bo 21 (COP21) tebang le Letlhomeso la Tumelano ya Dinagakopano tebang le Phetogo ya Maemo a Loapi (UNFCCC), tumelano e e sa tseeng letlhakore e e tshwaraganyang maphata otlhe e tla amogelwPhetogo ya maemo a loapi ke bothata jwa lefatshe lotlhe mme go tlhokega tharabololo ya lefatshe lotlhe, e leng seo se ka baakanngwang ka tshwanelo ke dipuso di le mmalwa, ka fa tlase ga tetlelelo ya UNFCCC le makoko otlhe a tsaya karolMo Aforika Borwa re ka bua ka boikgantsho gore re tsentsetirisong dipholisi tse di mafolofolo e bile e le tsa boitshimololedi tse di gatelang pele, mmogo le maano a a samaganang le maemo a loapi a a fetogetseng rur Dipholisi tseno di laolwa ke metheo e e reretsweng ruri ya tlhabololo ya leruri, e leng karolo e e botlhokwa thata ya Ponelopele ya 2030 jaaka go tlhagelela mo ND Jaaka e le kopano ya bofelofelo ya Kabinete monongwaga wa 2015, kabinete e eletsa maAforika Borwa otlhe matlhatsi le matlhogonolo mo pakeng e e tlang ya khunolog Ka mowa wa setlha seno le ka go tsweletsa mowa wa Botho, Kabinete e ikuela mo maAforika Borweng otlhe go ka thusa batho le malapa a a tlhokang mo dit habeng tsa bobon Re set haba se se tlhokomelanang, se se tlhotlanang mme e bile se tlhokomela bao ba humanegilen Ngwaga o Mo wa o o tlang o neela botlhe t hono ya go ikana gape go direla bokamoso jo bo botoka mo go botlhe Matshediso Kabinete e romela matshediso a yone le kutlwelobotlhoko kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa Mohamed Ismail ( Issy ) Dinat, yo a ragileng kgamelo ka Labobedi, 8 Sedimonthol Go se inaganele a le esi ga gagwe mmogo le mo go nneng le seabe ga gagwe mo kgaratlhong go nnile le seabe mo go iponeleng kgololesego ya rona Go thapiwaGo thapiwa gotlhe go tla diragadiwa trg_text: Cabinet approved for the submission to Parliament of South Africa s 5th Periodic Report (2009-2014) on the Implementation of the Convention on the Elimination of all Forms of Discrimination against Wome The report provides an overview on the effectiveness of the range of laws, policies and programmes implemented and highlights the country s achievements on women s empowerment and gender equalit The report also recognises that there are persistent challenges and barriers to overcoming inequality and discrimination in the countr

src_text: Katoloso ya konteraka ya go thapiwa ya Rre Thabane Wiseman Zulu jaaka Mokaedikakaretso (DG) kwa Lefapheng la Enej Ngaka Mmaphaka Ephraim Tau jaaka Motlatsamokaedikakaretso (DDG): Botsamaisi jwa Metswedi ya Tlhago le ya Bodirelatlhapi kwa Lefapheng la Temothuo, Jalo ya Dikgwa le Bodirelatlhap Mme Kelebogile Sybil Sethibelo jaaka DDG: Bobusi jwa Ditheo kwa Lefapheng la Botsweretshi le Sets Rre Omega Shelembe jaaka DDG: Tlhokomelo ya Dikgwebokgolo tsa Puso le Dikgwebokgolo tsa Tlhabololo ya Thekenoloji ya Ditlhaeletsano le Tshedimosetso kwa Lefapheng la Mafaratlhatlha a Ditlhaeletsano le Ditirelo tsa Poso (DTPS).. src_text: Mme Thulisile Glory Manzini jaaka DDG: Lephata la Tsamaiso kwa DTPFa re digela, Kabinete e leboga maAforika Borwa ao a obametseng tsa lekgetho ka go tsenya dipusetso tsa bone tsa lekgetho e leng seo se dirileng gore go nne le palogotlhe ya dipusetso tsa lekgetho di le
trg_text: The fight against illicit drugs is in line with the NDP and the Dialogue will provide a platform to further enhance the National Drug Master Plan (2013-2017).

src_text: milione tse di amogetsweng tsa baobamelalekgethSeno se kwa godimo ka 1% go gaisa ka 2014, e bile kobamelo ya baduelalekgetho ya go tsenya dikopo ka nako e fetile 90% mo dingwageng di le tharo tse di latelananKobamelo e e jaaka eno ya maemo a a kwa godimo e thusa puso go abelana ka ditirelo tse di tokafatsang boleng jwa matshelo a baagi botlhMo pakeng eno ya khunulogo, puso e tsenyatirisong matsholo a a farologaneng a a tlhokang gore maAforika Borwa otlhe mmogo le baeng ba yone go tshameka karolo ya bone mo go netefatseng gore ba keteka paka ya khunulogo mo tikologong e e babalesegileng e bile e sireletsegilKabinete e ikuela mo go botlhe go dirisana mmogo le Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borw(SAPS) le go bega tiragalo efe kgotsa efe ya bosenyi mo malapeng le mo dit habeng tsa boronMo go kgoneng gore go amogelwe thologelo ya baeti ba ba kgabaganyang melelwane, mafapha otlhe a puso kwa meeding ya go tsena mo nageng go simolola ka la bo 10 Sedimonthole 2015 go fitlha ka la bo 14 Ferikgong 2016 go tla atolosiwa diura tsa one tsa tirel One a tla akaretsa Lefapha la Boitekanelo, Lefapha la Temothuo, SAPS, Lefapha la Merero ya Selega le Tirelo ya Lekgetho ya Aforika Borwa (SARS).

src_text: Dintlha ka botlalo di ka fitlhelwa mo wwhome-affairgozBadirisi botlhe ba mebila go ikuelwa mo go bone go obamela melao ya tsela, go akaretsa kobamelo ya melao e e tobaneng le lebelo la mo mebileng; ba netefatse fa dijanaga di siametse go ka tsena mo mebileng; ba kganne ba sa itshiela ka madila mmogo le go apara mapanta a pabaleseg Batsamayakadinao go ikuelwa mo go bone go netefatsa gore fa ba tsamaya mo mebileng ga ba baye matshelo a bone kgotsa a bakganni ba dikoloi mo kotsin Badiri ba tsa molao ba tla tswa ka makatlanamane go samagana le dithuntsebe tse di tlolakakang molDipotsiso:Mme Nebo Legoabe (Mmueledi wa Kabinete wa Namaotshwere)Mogala: 082 453 2874
